sectiondiv.p: This procedure provides instructions on how to delete a CSAR package from CBAM.

note.p: For more information on CBAM, see CloudBand Application Manager (CBAM) documentation in the Nokia Discovery Center by going to https://doc.networks.nokia.com

context.p: Before beginning this procedure, ensure that you are logged in to the CBAM GUI.
To delete the CSAR package from CBAM:

step.cmd: In the CBAM GUI, click the options button with three horizontal lines, and then select Catalog. The Catalog pane appears.

In the Catalog pane, click select the appropriate CSAR package and hover the mouse over the right of the selected line, and then click the Delete Package button represented by the trash icon. The Delete VNF package? window appears.

info.p: The Catalog pane appears without this CSAR package.
